channel.title: Updates on Brian Flynn
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Brian Flynn

item.title: My new website
item.description:
Today, I have created the new brianflynn.org website. A home to learn about me and see what I am up to!

Thanks to Simply Static, a WordPress Static Site Generator, I can run the new website with no cost with Cloudflare Pages.

The site features 4 distinct sections:

  • Hero to act as an introduction to me

  • A list of my projects to show off my current work, including BRIANS NEWS

  • Info about my skills and ahchievements
